title: Number of hospitals in Finland 2007 to 2017
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of hospitals. In total the number of data points it has is 11.
Overall Number of hospitals has decreased over the Year.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
Maximum Number of hospitals, about 325.0 was reported at Year 2007
Minimum Number of hospitals about 247.0 was reached at Year 2017
